musicCollection.title: This is my collection!
musicCollection.shortdesc: I like to call it "unusual". Note that this document contains multiple languages, so it will only work for XHTML output.

cdRow.comments: My dad gave me this album. It's great. Austin music, with a fiddle.
This one's so good, my dad got it for Christmas this year.
I saw this Australian band playing on the streets of Amsterdam in 1997. They were amazing, and I bought their first CD right there. The newer ones are just as good.
Ahh, guitars and singing. Make yourself at home.

I met their producer at the XML Conference in Baltimore, at the final lunch. We talked about music. He went home to Australia, and sent me this disc to see what I thought. After several years it remains one of my favorite albums.
I liked the first album so much I had to order the new one, despite the international shipping fees. Almost as good as their first.
Wonderful introduction to defunct local music.
Bought this one while in college -- shocking to find it up in Minnesota.
A bunch of crazy folkies from Canada. They're so much fun in concert, it's indescribable. Their fans are a bit nuts though.
När jag lyssnar till Hänspolska, jag visar hänsor.
Я читал их стихи на моей свадьбе!
Я их видел в Москве, 13.06.2001. Сумащедшая музыка. Смерть и цветы -- Замечательно!
